connect20/fancy_product_compare.name: connect20/Fancy_Product_Compare

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/fancy_product_compare.description: Fancy Product Compare Magento extension allows the visitors on your Magento store to compare the products in a very convenient way. Product comparison is done in a fancy popup window where user can add the product to cart or wishlist.
